page.title: 06Transport
page.content: Welling Corner has many bus routes servicing the area.A recent survey showed buses to be reasonably punctual.The majority ran every 12 minutes.From Welling Corner passengers may travel to Sidcup,Orpington, Charlton,Forest Hill,Lewisham, Dartford,Woolwich and Catford.Every two hours a Green Line bus passes through Welling on its route from Southend to Victoria. When interviewed,passengers were generally satisfied but many complained about dirty buses. From Welling Station,trains run every 30 minutes to Charing Cross or Canon Street,and to Dartford where link trains can be caught to the Kent Coast.
